Issues from previous releases

These issues are not necessarily bugs, but they may help provide advice if you run into problems with our release.

  • Traditional: Don't use '-traditional' with ANSI header files
  • C++ Debugging: `-gstabs' gives better C++ coff debugging
  • CPU32: Options for CPU32 and CPU32+ targets
  • GCC Function Attributes: New GCC syntax for function attributes
  • Remote GDB: Debugging remote connections
  • Where IDP support went: Accessing the `m68k-idp-*' targets
  • Unixware and ar: No `ar q...' on Unixware
  • RS/6000 NLS: The LANG variable on RS/6000
  • MS-DOS requirements: Requirements for MS-DOS
  • MS-DOS vs Info: GNU Info discomfort on MS-DOS

Go to the first, previous, next, last section, table of contents.
